title: Pixel 4 turns itself off when using Dormi baby monitor app
content:
I have two original Pixels that use the Dormi app (in parent mode) without any issue at all.

I have two Pixel 4 phones that both randomly shut themselves off when using the same app.

I was hoping the Jan 2020 updates would fix the issue but they have not. I don't think there is much point to resetting the phone and such measures when I have two phones with exactly the same behavior.
